text:
Alexa Chung is joining the widely popular #FreeTheNipple movement with her latest photo shoot. The model and TV host teamed up with legendary photographer Patrick Demarchelier for a gorgeous black-and-white shoot for Love magazine, along with Ashley Graham and Doutzen Kroes.

In Chung's photo, she is seen posing topless, wearing a dark pair of jeans and chunky studded belt. With her hands on her hips, she stares confidently at the camera, and the pride she has about her body is definitely palpable. Demarchelier shared the photograph on his Instagram page last night, where it's already received over 22k likes and complimentary comments from his followers.

Demarchelier also took to social media to share the black-and-white photos he took of Graham and Kroes, both of which are just as beautiful. The two women are pictured nude in their photos; Graham is seen with a hand draped over her breasts, while Kroes sits facing away from the camera with her legs tucked up towards her chest. We are so totally here for these gorgeous images that celebrate these women's bodies. Check out the other photos below, and see them IRL in the upcoming issue of Love magazine, available next Monday, July 24.
